refnamediv.refpurpose: checks status of current transaction or server.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Checks status of subject. Subject can be either 'MTS' or 'TRANSACTION'. In the first case this checks if the server is connected to MTS. In the second case, checks if 2pc control is enabled for the current transaction. This function returns status string. For 'MTS' it could be either 'connected' or 'disconnected'. For 'TRANSACTION' - either '2pc enabled' or '2pc disabled'.
